txt.en: Defeat the Gaunt-lord Ferndúr in the Lost Temple discovered within the Trollshaws before he completes his plan to unleash a deadly plague upon the North!
The gate to Ferndúr's chamber has been opened
Search the temple for Ferndúr's location
Ferndúr the Virulent has nearly completed his deadly experiments beneath the lost Rhudauran temple.\n\nHe and his servants must be defeated before his plans come to fruition!
You have discovered Ferndúr the Virulent, in the  central chamber, in the depths of the lost Rhudauran temple.\n\nHe and his servants must be defeated before his plans come to fruition!
